title: Child development: infants are individuals
creator_credit: Clinic of Child Development and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The material in this film is taken from the Clinic’s photographic records made over a period of 20 years. Each child’s unique individuality asserts itself even in infancy. Bob, Amy, Bess, and Dan at the age of five, we look at their progress from about 12 weeks old to five years.
